ourStory.title: Our Story
ourStory.paragraph1: Al Hanan Education Centre was founded in 2019 by Ummul Qura Cultural and Development Foundation with a singular vision: to create a premium Muslim school in Uganda that would combine rigorous academics with comprehensive Qur'anic memorization (Hifdh).
ourStory.paragraph2: Fully registered and recognized by the Ministry of Education and Sports, Uganda, Al Hanan has grown into a beacon of Islamic education excellence in East Africa. Our learners are not ordinary—they embody discipline, academic excellence, unwavering Islamic faith, and authentic leadership.
ourStory.paragraph3: Located in Bulubandi, Nakigo, Iganga District, we provide a conducive learning environment where every learner completes Primary Seven having both memorized the entire Holy Qur'an and achieved outstanding academic performance.
ourStory.imageAlt: Al Hanan Education Centre Admin block building showcasing school infrastructure

services.title: Services
services.q1: What services does Al Hanan offer?
services.a1: We provide comprehensive educational solutions including Qur'an memorization programs, Islamic studies, academic excellence programs, sports and arts activities, and community service programs. Our expertise spans primary and secondary education with specialized programs.
services.q2: Do you work with international students?
services.a2: Yes, while our main campus is in Bulubandi, Nakiggyo, Iganga, Uganda, we welcome students from across East Africa and internationally. Our management systems and communication enable us to work effectively with parents abroad.
services.q3: What specializations and pathways do you offer?
services.a3: We focus on Islamic education programs that combine Qur'an memorization, Islamic studies, and academic excellence. We offer specialized pathways in Qur'anic studies, academic excellence, and comprehensive leadership development.

process.title: Administrative Process
process.q1: How do I request a visit or consultation?
process.a1: You can request a visit through our contact page, calling us directly, or emailing us. We'll schedule a convenient time to discuss your child's needs and showcase our facilities.
process.q2: What is the academic calendar and holiday schedule?
process.a2: We follow the standard Ugandan academic calendar with three school terms. We have set holiday periods and regular weekend breaks. Complete calendar information is provided to parents upon enrollment.
process.q3: How do you handle changing student needs and curricula adaptation?
process.a3: We take a comprehensive approach to teaching with regular assessments and feedback to parents. We coordinate with parents and teachers to customize support and curriculum based on individual student needs. Transparent communication throughout the year is essential.

support.title: Support and Care
support.q1: Do you provide support and care after enrollment?
support.a1: Yes, all our programs include comprehensive support encompassing academic, psychological, health, and spiritual support. We provide regular counseling sessions, academic monitoring, and holistic student support throughout their school years.
support.q2: What is the level of security and care in the school?
support.a2: Safety and protection are our highest priorities. We implement standard safety protocols including continuous supervision, trained staff, a secure environment, and full compliance with Ugandan safety standards and protection policies.
support.q3: How do you handle behavioral and academic challenges?
support.a3: We have a specialized support team that works with students and parents to address challenges. We use positive specialized strategies rather than punishment. Support includes counseling, regular reviews, and customized action plans.

fees.title: Fees and Payment
fees.a1: Fees vary by program and academic level. We provide complete transparency in costs with breakdown of each fee component. Complete fee schedules are available from the admissions office.
fees.a2: Yes, we offer flexible payment options including monthly, termly, and annual payments. We can also discuss special arrangements in specific cases. Contact the administration office to explore your options.
fees.q3: What additional fees are included beyond the basic tuition?
fees.a3: Additional fees may include books and learning materials, uniform, food and beverages, extra-curricular activities, and educational trips. A complete breakdown is provided to parents at the start and they are informed of any changes in advance.

testimonials.heading: What Parents and Students Say
testimonials.description: Discover real experiences from parents and students who have enrolled in Al Hanan programs

testimonial1.name: Ngobi Peter
testimonial1.text: The DRAIS School Management System has completely transformed how we manage our school operations. From student enrollment to grade management, everything is now automated and efficient. Our teachers can easily input grades, parents receive real-time updates about their children's progress, and our administrative workload has reduced by over 60%. The parent-teacher communication portal has been particularly impressive - parents love being able to track attendance, assignments, and academic performance instantly.

testimonial2.name: Ssekatawa Huzaifa
testimonial2.text: As an Islamic educational institution, we needed a system that could handle both our academic and religious studies curriculum seamlessly. The customized school management solution has exceeded our expectations. The system efficiently manages our Quran memorization programs, Islamic studies classes, and regular academic subjects. Arabic language support and Islamic calendar integration were particularly valuable.

testimonial3.name: Wagogo Husama
testimonial3.text: Managing a Quran memorization center requires specialized tools that traditional school systems don't provide. A tailored solution was developed that tracks each student's memorization progress, verse by verse. The system includes features for recording recitation assessments, tracking Tajweed improvements, and managing different levels of Quranic studies. Teachers can easily input daily progress, and parents receive detailed reports about their child's memorization journey.

testimonial4.name: Sheikh Hassan Mwaita
testimonial4.text: DRAIS has transformed our school management in ways we never imagined. Before implementing this system, we were managing everything manually, which was inefficient and error-prone. Now, with DRAIS, our administrative operations run seamlessly. The system has elevated our school management far beyond what we could achieve with traditional methods. It has brought efficiency, control, and modernization to every aspect of our operations.

happiest.name: Wekesa Muhammad
happiest.text: The Zyra SACCO Management System has transformed our scrap metal dealers' cooperative completely. Before this system, managing member contributions, loans, and savings was a manual nightmare with frequent errors and disputes. Now everything is automated and transparent. Members can check their account balances, loan status, and transaction history anytime through the member portal.
